config.settings.production module¶

Production Configurations
  • Use djangosecure
SECRET_KEY = 'CHANGEME!!!lp#7%-y6+lsk0yv$9d-22=n^ab8x5hkb!(#d$u2vi5+2-2w&@@'¶

Raises ImproperlyConfigured exception if DJANGO_SECRET_KEY not in os.environ. For more information, see secret key. .. _secret key: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/ref/settings/#secret-key

SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS = 60¶

Set to 60 seconds, then to 518400 when you are sure that everything works.

SECURE_PROXY_SSL_HEADER = ('HTTP_X_FORWARDED_PROTOCOL', 'https')¶
SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT = True¶

See this question.

SECURE_FRAME_DENY = True¶
SECURE_HSTS_INCLUDE_SUBDOMAINS = True¶
SECURE_CONTENT_TYPE_NOSNIFF = True¶
SECURE_BROWSER_XSS_FILTER = True¶
SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE = True¶
SESSION_COOKIE_HTTPONLY = True¶
CSRF_COOKIE_SECURE = False¶
CSRF_COOKIE_HTTPONLY = True¶
X_FRAME_OPTIONS = 'DENY'¶
ALLOWED_HOSTS = ['leukgen.mskcc.org']¶

Hosts/domain names that are valid for this site See allowed hosts

DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL = 'leukapp <noreply@leukgen.mskcc.org>'¶
EMAIL_SUBJECT_PREFIX = '[leukapp] '¶
SERVER_EMAIL = 'leukapp <noreply@leukgen.mskcc.org>'¶
